jewelry.affix: Prevent all Arcane damage taken and heal yourself for 20–25% of the amount prevented.
jewelry.name: Countess Julia's Cameo

jewelry.affix: Increases duration of Stun effects by 20–25%.
jewelry.name: Dovu Energy Trap

jewelry.affix: After casting Shadow Power, Smoke Screen, or Vault, take 50–60% reduced damage for 8 seconds.
jewelry.name: Elusive Ring

jewelry.affix: Increases the duration of Phalanx avatars by 200%.
jewelry.name: Eternal Union

jewelry.affix: After earning a massacre bonus, 4–6 Skeletons are summoned to fight by your side for 10 seconds.
jewelry.name: Golden Gorget of Leoric

jewelry.affix: Your Ice Armor now reduces damage from melee attacks by 50–60% and automatically casts Frost Nova whenever you take 10% of your Life in damage.
jewelry.name: Halo of Arlyse

jewelry.affix: You take 45–60% less damage for 3 seconds after your Storm Armor electrocutes an enemy more than 30 yards away.
jewelry.name: Halo of Karini

jewelry.affix: Summons shadow clones to your aid when you Stun an enemy. This effect may occur once every 30 seconds.
jewelry.name: Haunt of Vaxo

jewelry.affix: Simulacrum now drains 5% of your maximum life every second and lasts twice as long.
jewelry.name: Haunted Visions

jewelry.affix: Chance to launch an explosive ball of Hellfire when you attack.
jewelry.name: Hellfire Ring

jewelry.affix: Chance to launch an explosive ball of Hellfire when you attack.
jewelry.name: Hellfire Ring

jewelry.affix: Chance to launch an explosive ball of Hellfire when you attack.
jewelry.name: Hellfire Ring

jewelry.affix: Chance to launch an explosive ball of Hellfire when you attack.
jewelry.name: Hellfire Ring

jewelry.affix: Chance on hit to engulf the ground in lava, dealing 200% weapon damage per second for 6 seconds.
jewelry.name: Hellfire Ring

jewelry.affix: Gain damage reduction equal to 45–55% of your Block Chance.
jewelry.name: Justice Lantern

jewelry.affix: Taking Fire damage restores your primary resource.
jewelry.name: Krede's Flame

jewelry.affix: You deal 75–100% increased damage against slowed enemies or triple this bonus against enemies afflicted by any other type of control-impairing effect.
jewelry.name: Krysbin's Sentence

jewelry.affix: Picking up gold heals you for an amount equal to the gold that was picked up.
jewelry.name: Kymbo's Gold

jewelry.affix: Your damage reduction is increased by 0.75–0.95% for every 1% Life you are missing.
jewelry.name: Lornelle's Sunstone

jewelry.affix: Enemies stunned with Paralysis also take 13000–14000% weapon damage as Lightning.
jewelry.name: Manald Heal

jewelry.affix: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for 10–15% of the amount prevented.
jewelry.name: Mara's Kaleidoscope

jewelry.affix: Hitting an enemy within 15 yards has a chance to ward you with shards of Arcane energy that explode when enemies get close, dealing 240–320% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 15 yards.
jewelry.name: Moonlight Ward

jewelry.affix: Summons a Fallen Lunatic to your side every 10–12 seconds.
jewelry.name: Nagelring

jewelry.affix: Reduce the remaining cooldown of one of your skills by 1 seconds when you hit with a resource-spending attack.
jewelry.name: Obsidian Ring of the Zodiac

jewelry.affix: Chance to create an area of focused power on killing a monster. Damage is increased by 70–85% while standing in the area.
jewelry.name: Oculus Ring

jewelry.affix: Chance on hit to charm the enemy. While charmed, the enemy takes 35% increased damage.
jewelry.name: Overwhelming Desire

jewelry.affix: Enemies slain while Feared die in a bloody explosion and cause other nearby enemies to flee in Fear.
jewelry.name: Pandemonium Loop

jewelry.affix: Summon a treasure goblin who picks up normal-quality items for you. After picking up 12–16 items, he drops a rare item with a chance for a legendary.
jewelry.name: Puzzle Ring

jewelry.affix: Enemies you kill have a 3–4% additional chance to drop a health globe.
jewelry.name: Rakoff's Glass of Life

jewelry.affix: Gain 45–60% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after Fearing an enemy.
jewelry.name: Rechel's Ring of Larceny

jewelry.affix: You deal 250–300% increased damage to enemies affected by both your Haunt and Locust Swarm.
jewelry.name: Ring of Emptiness

jewelry.affix: Reduces the number of items needed for set bonuses by 1 (to a minimum of 2).
jewelry.name: Ring of Royal Grandeur

jewelry.affix: Increase your Life per Second by up to 75–100% based on your missing Life.
jewelry.name: Rogar's Huge Stone

jewelry.affix: Increase the damage of Whirlwind by 250–300%
jewelry.name: Skull Grasp

jewelry.affix: Prevent all Cold damage taken and heal yourself for 10–15% of the amount prevented.
jewelry.name: Talisman of Aranoch

jewelry.affix: Chance on hit to pull in enemies toward your target and Slow them by 60–80%.
jewelry.name: The Ess of Johan

jewelry.affix: Each corpse consumed in the Land of the Dead grants a stack of Macabre Knowledge. Macabre Knowledge increases the damage of Corpse Lance and Corpse Explosion by 150–200% while outside Land of the Dead.
jewelry.name: The Johnstone

jewelry.affix: Gargantuan instead summons three smaller gargantuans each more powerful than before.
jewelry.name: The Short Man's Finger

jewelry.affix: Prevent all Fire damage taken and heal yourself for 10–15% of the amount prevented.
jewelry.name: The Star of Azkaranth

jewelry.affix: Zombie Dogs instead summons a single gargantuan dog with more damage and health than all other dogs combined.
jewelry.name: The Tall Man's Finger

jewelry.affix: All damage taken is split between wearers of this item.
jewelry.name: Unity

jewelry.affix: Increases the maximum stacks of Bone Armor by 5.
jewelry.name: Wisdom of Kalan

jewelry.affix: Lightning damage has a 25–35% chance to Stun for 1.5 seconds.
jewelry.name: Wyrdward

jewelry.affix: Prevent all Lightning damage taken and heal yourself for 10–15% of the amount prevented.
jewelry.name: Xephirian Amulet

weapons.affix: Teleport no longer has a cooldown but costs 25 Arcane Power.
weapons.name: Aether Walker

weapons.affix: Chance on killing a demon to gain a random Shrine effect.
weapons.name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander

weapons.affix: Akarat's Champion gains the effects of the Prophet and Embodiment of Power runes.
weapons.name: Akkhan's Addendum

weapons.affix: Each enemy hit by your Blessed Shield increases the damage of your Blessed Shield by 15–20% for 3 seconds.
weapons.name: Akkhan's Leniency

weapons.affix: Zombie Dogs stuns enemies around them for 1.5 seconds when summoned.
weapons.name: Anessazi Edge

weapons.affix: Weapon Throw generates up to 15–20 additional Fury based on how far away the enemy hit is. Maximum benefit when the enemy hit is 20 or more yards away.
weapons.name: Arreat's Law

weapons.affix: Heal for 3–4% of your missing Life when you kill an Undead enemy.
weapons.name: Arthef's Spark of Life

weapons.affix: Undead and Demon enemies within 25 yards take 500–650% weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked into the air.
weapons.name: Azurewrath

weapons.affix: When your Tempest Rush hits 3 or fewer enemies, it gains 100% Critical Hit Chance.
weapons.name: Balance

weapons.affix: Enemies killed while Akarat's Champion is active turn into Phalanx Avatars for 10 seconds.
weapons.name: Baleful Remnant

weapons.affix: Frenzy now stacks up to 10 times.
weapons.name: Bastion's Revered

weapons.affix: Two Condemned enemies also trigger Condemn's explosion.
weapons.name: Blade of Prophecy

weapons.affix: War Cry and Threatening Shout cause an Avalanche and Earthquake.
weapons.name: Blade of the Tribes

weapons.affix: Bash consumes up to 40 Fury to deal up to 400–500% increased damage.
weapons.name: Blade of the Warlord

weapons.affix: Grants a 15–20% chance to block attacks. Blocked attacks inflict 30% less damage. After blocking an attack, your next attack inflicts 30% additional damage.
weapons.name: Blood Brother

weapons.affix: Blood oozes from you.
weapons.name: Blood-Magic Blade

weapons.affix: Blood oozes from you.
weapons.name: Blood-Magic Edge

weapons.affix: Death Nova deals 20–30% increased damage for every enemy within 15 yards.
weapons.name: Bloodtide Blade

weapons.affix: Chance on hit to summon a herd of murderous cows.
weapons.name: Bovine Bardiche

weapons.affix: Your projectiles pierce 1–2 additional times.

weapons.affix: Killing enemies and destroying objects has a chance to grant 20% of your maximum primary resource.
weapons.name: Burst of Wrath

weapons.affix: The Butcher still inhabits his carver.
weapons.name: Butcher's Carver

weapons.affix: Automatically cast Marked for Death when you damage an enemy.
weapons.name: Calamity

weapons.affix: Falling Sword can be used again within 4 seconds before the cooldown is triggered.
weapons.name: Cam's Rebuttal

weapons.affix: 25–50% chance to sunder the ground your enemies walk on when you attack.
weapons.name: Cataclysm

weapons.affix: Your Spike Traps lure enemies to them. Enemies may be taunted once every 12–16 seconds.
weapons.name: Chanon Bolter

weapons.affix: 25–50% chance to cast a fireball when attacking.
weapons.name: Cinder Switch

weapons.affix: 25–50% chance to cluck when attacking.
weapons.name: Cluckeye

weapons.affix: Chance on kill to raise a skeleton to fight for you. Upon accumulating 5 skeletons, they each explode for 1000% weapon damage and the sword transforms into Ashbringer for a short time. Attacking with Ashbringer burns your enemy for 5000–6000% weapon damage as Holy.
weapons.name: Corrupted Ashbringer

weapons.affix: Dashing Strike reduces your damage taken by 40–50% for 6 seconds.
weapons.name: Crystal Fist

weapons.affix: Fist of the Heavens has a 45–60% chance to be cast twice.
weapons.name: Darklight

weapons.affix: Reduce the cooldown of Vengeance by 50–65%.
weapons.name: Dawn

weapons.affix: Grasp of the Dead gains the effect of the Rain of Corpses rune.
weapons.name: Deadly Rebirth

weapons.affix: While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, all damage is increased by 30–35%.
weapons.name: Deathwish

weapons.affix: 35–65% chance to shoot explosive bolts when attacking.
weapons.name: Demon Machine

weapons.affix: Cleave deals up to 300–400% increased damage based on percentage of missing Fury.
weapons.name: Dishonored Legacy

weapons.affix: 20–35% chance to cause the ground to shudder when attacking.
weapons.name: Earthshatter

weapons.affix: Gain 100% Critical Hit Chance against enemies at full health.
weapons.name: Envious Blade

weapons.affix: Attacking enemies below 17–20% Life freezes them for 3 seconds.
weapons.name: Eun-jang-do

weapons.affix: Each enemy hit by Falling Sword increases the damage of Blessed Hammer by 50–60% for 10 seconds. Max 10 stacks.

weapons.affix: Gain two additional rays of Heaven’s Fury.
weapons.name: Fate of the Fell

weapons.affix: 25–50% chance to cast a fireball when attacking.
weapons.name: Fire Brand

weapons.affix: You are surrounded by a Chilling Aura when attacking.
weapons.name: Fjord Cutter

weapons.affix: Your Shield Glare deals damage equal to up to your last 5 Shield Bash casts.
weapons.name: Flail of the Ascended

weapons.affix: Dashing Strike increases the damage of Dashing Strike by 75–100% for 1 second, stacking up to 5 times.
weapons.name: Fleshrake

weapons.affix: Chance to double your attack speed when attacking.
weapons.name: Flying Dragon

weapons.affix: Attacks grant you an absorb shield for 2.0–3.0% of your maximum Life. Stacks up to 10 times.
weapons.name: Fortress Ballista

weapons.affix: Spectral Blade attacks 50% faster and deals 150–200% increased damage.
weapons.name: Fragment of Destiny

weapons.affix: Lightning damage has a chance to turn enemies into lightning rods, causing them to pulse 444–555% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 6 seconds.
weapons.name: Fulminator

weapons.affix: Siphon Blood drains blood from 2 additional targets.

weapons.affix: Reduces the Fury cost of Seismic Slam by 40–50%.
weapons.name: Fury of the Vanished Peak

weapons.affix: Chance to summon a ghostly Fallen Champion when attacking.

weapons.affix: Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by 30–40%.
weapons.name: Gesture of Orpheus

weapons.affix: Sweep Attack restores 4–6 Wrath for each enemy hit.

weapons.affix: Smite now jumps to 3 additional enemies.

weapons.affix: Removes the resource cost of Blessed Shield.

weapons.affix: 75–100% of your Thorns damage is applied on every attack.

weapons.affix: Chance to root enemies to the ground when you hit them.

weapons.affix: 7–10% chance on hit to summon a Spike Trap, Caltrops or Sentry.

weapons.affix: Your skill cooldowns are reduced by 8–10 seconds for 15 seconds after killing an elite pack.

weapons.affix: Reduces the Spirit cost of Wave of Light by 40–50%.
weapons.name: Incense Torch of the Grand Temple

weapons.affix: Casting Consecration also casts Consecration beneath all of your allies.
weapons.name: Inviolable Faith

weapons.affix: Increase the size of your Blessed Hammers.
weapons.name: Jace's Hammer of Vigilance

weapons.affix: When Dashing Strike hits an enemy more than 30–35 yards away, its Charge cost is refunded.

weapons.affix: Increase the attack speed and damage of Blessed Hammer by 100%.

weapons.affix: Blessed Hammer gains the effect of the Dominion rune.
weapons.name: Justinian's Mercy

weapons.affix: Strafe gains the effect of the Drifting Shadow rune.
weapons.name: K'mar Tenclip

weapons.affix: Impale returns 10–15 Hatred if it hits an enemy already Impaled.

weapons.affix: Casting Justice increases your movement speed by 15–20% for 2 seconds.

weapons.affix: Elemental Arrow now generates 3–4 Hatred.

weapons.affix: Increase the damage of Wave of Light by 150%. When the initial impact of your Wave of Light hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 200–250%.

weapons.affix: Reduces cooldown of Mass Confusion by 15–20 seconds.
weapons.name: Last Breath

weapons.affix: Bolas have a 15–20% chance on explosion to pull in all enemies within 24 yards.
weapons.name: Leonine Bow of Hashir

weapons.affix: Shadow Power also triggers Smoke Screen.
weapons.name: Lianna's Wings

weapons.affix: Seven-Sided Strike performs an additional 7 strikes.

weapons.affix: Every second, gain 160–200% increased damage for your next Fan of Knives. Stacks up to 30 times.

weapons.affix: After killing 10 enemies, you release a Poison Nova that deals 1050–1400% weapon damage as Poison to enemies within 30 yards.

weapons.affix: Stun enemies for 2 seconds the first time you hit them.

weapons.affix: Enemies occasionally flee at the sight of this staff.

weapons.affix: Chance on hit to summon a Demonic Slave.
weapons.name: Maximus

weapons.affix: Firebomb generates 100–125 Mana.

weapons.affix: Each different poison skill you use increases the damage of your poison skills by 50–65% for 15 seconds.

weapons.affix: Your primary skills attack 50% faster and deal 150–200% increased damage.
weapons.name: Oathkeeper

weapons.affix: 20–40% chance to Chain Lightning enemies when you hit them.

weapons.affix: Squeal!
weapons.name: Pig Sticker

weapons.affix: 25–50% chance to lob an acid blob when attacking.

weapons.affix: Plague of Toads now seek out enemies and can explode twice.

weapons.affix: The damage of Lashing Tail Kick is increased by 300% to the first 5–7 enemies hit.

weapons.affix: Casting a Lightning skill charges you with Lightning, causing you to deal 650–850% weapon damage as Lightning every second for 5 seconds to nearby enemies.

weapons.affix: 20–45% chance when attacking to explode with demonic fury for 1800-2000% weapon damage as Fire.

weapons.affix: Reduces the Mana cost of Zombie Charger by 40–50%.

weapons.affix: Your Secondary skills deal 250–300% additional damage while Bone Armor is active but reduce the remaining duration of Bone Armor by 4 seconds.

weapons.affix: Slain enemies rest in pieces.

weapons.name: Slorak's Madness

weapons.affix: Critical Hits have a 3–4% chance to spawn a health globe.

weapons.affix: When you kill an enemy, it explodes for 450–600% of your Life per Kill as damage to all enemies within 20 yards. You no longer benefit from your Life per Kill.

weapons.affix: Your Thorns is increased by 10–15% for every enemy afflicted by one of your curses.

weapons.affix: Your melee attacks throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy, dealing 550–700% weapon damage as Physical.

weapons.affix: Furious Charge deals increased damage equal to 200–250% of your bonus movement speed.

weapons.affix: Lightning damage is increased by 10–15% for every 10 yards you are from the target up to a maximum of 40 yards.

weapons.affix: Doubles the duration of Steed Charge.
